verses.text: \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3117"\w* dust \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* arrived \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground \w to|strong="H1961"\w* pay \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w homage|strong="H7812"\w*.

“\w Where|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H2088"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w*?” \w David|strong="H1732"\w* asked. “\w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1732"\w* replied.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* outcome?” \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.” “\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1732"\w* replied. “\w Many|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* asked \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w brought|strong="H1732"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w report|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w How|strong="H3588"\w* do \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*?”

“\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w happened|strong="H7122"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H2022"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*,” \w he|strong="H5921"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w leaning|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cavalry|strong="H6571"\w* closing \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w around|strong="H6437"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* answered, ‘\w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w*!’
‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H4310"\w*?’ \w he|strong="H4310"\w* asked. So I told him, ‘I am \w an|strong="H4310"\w* \w Amalekite|strong="H6003"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* begged \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, ‘\w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w agony|strong="H7661"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* seized \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* lingers.’

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w survive|strong="H2421"\w*. \w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w band|strong="H7218"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* lord.”

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H2388"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w them|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* same.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* inquired \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H1616"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w brought|strong="H1732"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w report|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H2088"\w* am \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H5046"\w*. “\w I|strong="H2088"\w* am \w an|strong="H2088"\w* \w Amalekite|strong="H6003"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w asked|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w lift|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* one \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H5066"\w*, \w execute|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*!” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Amalekite, “\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w testified|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w saying|strong="H6310"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.’” David’s Song for Saul and Jonathan

\w Then|strong="H7586"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H1732"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w lament|strong="H6969"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* ordered \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Song \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Bow|strong="H7198"\w*.\f + \fr 1:18 \ft Or be taught the use of the bow; literally be taught the bow\f* \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jashar|strong="H3477"\w*:\f + \fr 1:18 \ft Or the Book of the Upright One, commonly cited as Jasher; note that the Song of the Bow that follows is not found in known manuscripts attributed to Jasher.\f*

“\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H6643"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, lies \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w heights|strong="H1116"\w*. How \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*!

\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w it|strong="H8055"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w in|strong="H6189"\w* \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*; \w proclaim|strong="H1319"\w* \w it|strong="H8055"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w in|strong="H6189"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Ashkelon, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w exult|strong="H5937"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*, \w may|strong="H7704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w or|strong="H7704"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* yielding \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* grain.\f + \fr 1:21 \ft Or no showers falling on your terraced fields; LXX no fields of firstfruits; Hebrew no fields of offerings\f* \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w defiled|strong="H1602"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w no|strong="H1097"\w* longer \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\w From|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w retreat|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w beloved|strong="H5273"\w* \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w delightful|strong="H5273"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, \w were|strong="H7586"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w divided|strong="H6504"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H7586"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H7586"\w* \w stronger|strong="H1396"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* lions.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* luxury, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* decked \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H3830"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

How \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w have|strong="H5307"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thick \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*! \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* lies \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w heights|strong="H1116"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* grieve \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brother. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w delightful|strong="H5276"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w your|strong="H5921"\w* love \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3966"\w* \w extraordinary|strong="H6381"\w*, surpassing \w the|strong="H5921"\w* love \w of|strong="H5921"\w* women.

How \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w have|strong="H5307"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w have|strong="H5307"\w* perished!”
